text: Pep√© Le Pew is an animated skunk created by Chuck Jones in 1945. His original name was "Stinky". The Pepe le Pew cartoon, For Scent-imental Reasons (1949) was the only Chuck Jones-directed Looney Tunes cartoon that won the Academy Award for Best Animated short. He speaks with a French accent. title: Pepe le Pew
